inclusion.criterion: Pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The results of the biopsy were consistent with pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.

inclusion.criterion: Unsuitable for surgery, due to ASA score >/= III
inclusion.label: unknown
met
inclusion.evidence: She was treated with IV antibiotics (Zosyn, then ceftriaxone and flagyl) and will continue on them until seen by ID as an outpatient.

exclusion.criterion: Coagulopathy (international normalized ratio >1.5, partial thromboplastin time greater than twice that of control)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a poor mental condition or mental retardation, unable to understand the nature and possible consequences of the study
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas and was treated with IV antibiotics. However, she has a history of CAD and chronic kidney disease.
